{"id":631842872,"lang":"java","time":"6 months, 1 week","timestamp":1643665068,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"53 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/631842872/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"54.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int lengthOfLongestSubstring(String s) {\n        int res = 1;\n        if(s == null || s.length() == 0) return 0;\n        String sub = String.valueOf(s.charAt(0));\n        for(int i = 1; i < s.length(); i++) {\n            if(sub.contains(String.valueOf(s.charAt(i)))) {\n                sub = sub.substring(sub.indexOf(s.charAt(i)) + 1);\n            } \n            sub += s.charAt(i);\n            if(sub.length() > res) res = sub.length();\n        }\n        return res;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters"}
